wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Daryl King (born November 1963) is a British economist. He is senior economic adviser at HSBC Holdings, where he was chief economist from 1998 to July 2015. King also works as a journalist and consultant, and is a specialist adviser to the House of Commons Treasury Committee.He is author of Losing Control: The Emerging Threats to Western Prosperity (2010), When the Money Runs Out: The End of Western Affluence (2013) and Grave New World: The End of Globalization, the Return of History (2017).King identifies as a "Jew through choice", converting to Judaism in 1991. He has described experiencing antisemitism since his conversion and believes that antisemitism has become worse over time.

response: Stephen King (born 1947) is an American author.
Stephen King, Steven King or Steve King may also refer to:
* Stephen King (Gaelic footballer), former Gaelic football player for Cavan
* Stephen King (soccer) (born 1986), American Major League Soccer player
* Stephen King (The Dark Tower), a fictionalized, yet semi-autobiographical character of the author's creation
Daly was previously a winner for the Economic Research Council’s ‘Clash of the Titans’ forecasting competition, defeating Stephen King and Baroness Ros Altmann.
